p: Chronic inflammatory disease, such as atherosclerosis, nonalcoholic fatty liver disease (NAFLD) [ 3], chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) [ 4], inflammatory bowel disease (IBD) [ 5], and retinal illnesses [ 6], are responsible of pain, impaired function, and diminished quality of life, as well as, the associated high health-care costs and loss of productivity [ 7].
